title: Clockify Tray
blurb: A simple tray application for recording Clockify sessions.
gist: I built a simple Windows tray application to make recording sessions in Clockify easier!

title: Aiken to Forms
blurb: Easily import and write quizzes for Google Forms.
gist: I designed a web app to allow teachers to easily create Google Forms quizzes from the Aiken test format.

title: Personal Brand Redesign
blurb: An update to reflect my personal growth!
gist: I executed a major personal brand redesign. This very website was a key part of that initiative!

title: GitHub Workshop
blurb: A short introductory session to Git & GitHub.
gist: I created slides and interactive demos to teach the basics of Git and GitHub. I used these to lead the 2021 Elder GitHub workshop!

blurb: An anonymous counseling app for schools.

title: Modern Online Monitor

title: File Icon Extractor
